adverbs.description: politicly (comparative more politicly, superlative most politicly)

entries.meaning: In a politic manner; sagaciously; shrewdly; artfully.
examples: I must be ignorant indeed not to know, that the Duchess, ever since you met, hath been most politicly employed in increasing those forces, and sharpening those arms with which she subdued you at first  […]
